Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "[SAS Token] CloudBlobClientWrapper update to support SAS Tokens." (#8179) at NuGet/NuGetGallery
Opened pull request "Add feature flags to all OData endpoints" (#8178) at NuGet/NuGetGallery
Events.RelatedBody:
This allows us to individually disable non-hijacked endpoints. These feature flags are enabled by default, which is not following the existing pattern but is desirable in this case. We're turning OFF a feature, not ON which is what feature flags have been used for thus far.  It's easy to achieve this with our framework.

Progress on https://github.com/NuGet/Engineering/issues/2902.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "NuGet.Client should replace using of ManagedImageMonikers with KnownMonikers" (#9977) at NuGet/Home
Events.RelatedBody:
NuGet.VisualStudio.Implementation uses 3 icons from ManagedImageMonikers:

ManagedImageMonikers.ReferencePrivate -> KnownMonikers.ReferencePrivate
ManagedImageMonikers.Application -> KnownMonikers.Application
[Blocked] ManagedImageMonikers.NuGetGrey -> KnownMonikers.PackageReferencePrivate

These monikers should be replaced with KnownMonikers equivalents to make sure that they pick up the icon refresh.

The first two icons can be found in Microsoft.VisualStudio.ImageCatalog, 16.8.30431.43-pre. The latter is being worked on and will be available soon.

These APIs will be deleted from dll: https://github.com/dotnet/project-system/pull/6570.

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Add support for msbuild restore + static graph restore in the perf scripts" (#9969) at NuGet/Home
Closed issue "[Bug Bash][Test Failure] Warning icons show on the installed packages in Console App (.NET Core 5.0) project" (#9910) at NuGet/Home
Events.RelatedBody:
## Details about Problem
NuGet version: NuGet Client Dev\5.8.0.6776
VS Version: Master\30413.119
OS: Windows-10-Enterprise-RS5
## Detailed repro steps 
1. Create a C# Console App (.NET Core) project in VS.
2. Open the project PM UI and the Solution Explorer window.
3. Install several packages from PM UI into the project.
4. Check the “Dependencies->Packages” node in the Solution Explorer window.
## Expected
No warning icons show on the installed package.
## Actual
Warning icons show on the installed packages in Console App (.NET Core 5.0) project but there is no warning in Error List window as below screenshot.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20632625/90264971-81072580-de84-11ea-9e37-d2a64a649a1b.png)
## Notes
1. It repro on ASP Web Application (.NET Core 5.0), but not repro on Class Library (.NET Standard 2.1) project.
2. It didn’t repro when creating the .NET Core 5.0 project (so it is not the bug 1165638), repro after installing packages.
3. It didn’t repro on VS Master\30411.167 + NuGet Client Dev\5.8.0.6776, but repro on Master\30413.119 with implicit NuGet Client Dev\5.8.0.6776.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Error messages about targeting runtime 'win7-x64' are littering Visual Studio error list" (#9976) at NuGet/Home
Events.RelatedBody:
When I open NuGet.sln in Visual Studio, error list is littered with error messages 

```
Project is targeting runtime 'win7-x64' but did not resolve any runtime-specific packages for the 'Microsoft.NETCore.App' package.  This runtime may not be supported by .NET Core.
```

There is one for each test project (21 in total).

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "[Test Failure]Error “Unable to load the service index for source https://apidev.nugettest.org/v3-index/index.json” occurs after switching package source" (#9958) at NuGet/Home
Events.RelatedBody:
## Details about Problem
VS Version: Main\30430.19
OS Version: Windows-10-Enterprise-RS5.
NuGet Version: Dev\5.8.0.6801

## Installations
1. Install VS: https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_build/results?buildId=4024945&view=ms.vss-build-web.run-extensions-tab
2. Install NuGet: \\ddfiles\drops\NuGet\Drops\CI\NuGet.Client\dev\5.8.0.6801\artifacts\VS15\NuGet.Tools.vsix

## Detailed repro steps 
1.  Launch Visual Studio 2019 preview.
2.  Create a new C# Class Library (.Net Framework) project.
3.  Add a deprecated package source: https://apidev.nugettest.org/v3-index/index.json.
4. Click “Browse” tab.

## Expected
All packages can be loaded successfully.

## Actual
Error “Unable to load the service index for source https://apidev.nugettest.org/v3-index/index.json” occurs after switching package source as below screenshot.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40230425/91703960-8fa44b00-ebad-11ea-855d-9748976dd4cf.png)

## Error Message
Severity | Code | Description | Project | File | Line | Suppression State
-- | -- | -- | -- | -- | -- | --
Error |   | [Package source]   Unable to load the service index for source   https://apidev.nugettest.org/v3-index/index.json.  An error occurred while sending the   request.  The underlying connection was   closed: Could not establish trust relationship for the SSL/TLS secure   channel.  The remote certificate is   invalid according to the validation procedure. |   |   |   |  

## Note
Suspect it is the NuGet Server issue since it repro before installing the NuGet with the impilicit NuGet Client build "Dev\6.8.0.6783", but didn't repro on VS Main\30423.24 + NuGet Client Dev\5.8.0.6783.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "CVE-2020-1340 - NuGet Gallery Spoofing Vulnerability" (#45) at NuGet/Announcements
Events.RelatedBody:
A spoofing vulnerability exists when the NuGet Gallery does not properly sanitize input on package metadata values. An attacker who successfully exploited the vulnerability could perform cross-site scripting attacks and run scripts in the security context of the user viewing the malicious content.

To exploit this vulnerability, an attacker with permissions to upload packages could publish specially crafted content on a gallery page.

The security update addresses the vulnerability by correcting how NuGet Gallery sanitizes input.

**MSRC Security Guidance:** [CVE-2020-1340](https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2020-1340)
**Security Update:** [v2020.06.09](https://github.com/NuGet/NuGetGallery/releases/tag/v2020.06.09)
